casebody.data:
STATE
v.
MYERS AND COLEMAN. No. 660PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 23, 2006. William B. Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State. Brian Michael Aus, Durham, for Jesse Warren Coleman.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of June 2006 by Defendants for extension to file brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendants (Myers and Coleman) shall have up to and including the 10th day of July 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of June 2006."
